verbs.description: Nine months ago the very idea that Pr*sident Donald Trump and the supreme leader of North Korea Kim Jong - un [V: would] be sitting down at a summit seemed ludicrous . The two men were regularly engaged in chest - thumping , trading insults via Twitter and state ...
